description: I. Letter dated 02/02/2009 from Baroness Royall of Blaisdon to the House of Lords regarding the current position on police access to the House of Lords for the purpose of searching a Member's office. 2 p. II. Memorandum by the Clerk of the Parliaments on police access to the House of Lords. 16 p.
department: CLERK OF THE PARLIAMENTS Leader of the House of Lords
